description.brazilian: Mate 500 inimigos.
description.spanish: Mata a 500 enemigos.

description.brazilian: Compre 50 itens.
description.spanish: Compra 50 objetos.

description.brazilian: Destrua 100 destrutíveis em uma partida.
description.french: Détruire 100 éléments destructibles en une seule partie.
description.polish: Zniszcz 100 obiektów zniszczalnych w jednym podejściu.
description.russian: Уничтожьте 100 разрушаемых объектов за один заход.
description.schinese: 单次游戏中破坏100个可摧毁物品。
description.spanish: Destruye 100 destructibles de una sola vez.
description.tchinese: 在一次冒險中摧毀100件地圖物品
description.turkish: Tek oyunda 100 tane yok edilebilir yok et.

description.brazilian: Mate 5 inimigos com balas desviadas de armadilha em uma partida.
description.english: Kill 5 enemies with deflected trap bullets in one run.
description.french: Tuer 5 enemis avec des projectiles de pièges déviés en une seule partie.
description.polish: Zabij 5 wrogów odbitymi pociskami pułapek w jednym podejściu.
description.russian: Убейте 5 врагов отраженными пулями за один заход.
description.schinese: 在一次冒险中利用偏转的陷阱子弹击杀5名敌人。
description.spanish: Mata a 5 enemigos con balas trampa desviadas en una sola partida.
description.tchinese: 在一次冒險中反彈陷阱子彈，擊殺5個或以上敵人
description.turkish: Tek oyunda saptırılmış tuzak mermileriyle 5 düşman öldür.

description.brazilian: Pegue 4 itens de um altar demoníaco sem morrer.
description.english: Pick up 4 items from a demonic altar without dying.
description.french: Ramasser 4 objets d'un autel démoniaque sans mourir.
description.polish: Podnieś 4 przedmioty z demonicznego ołtarza, nie umierając.
description.russian: Возьмите 4 предмета с демонического алтаря, не умерев.
description.schinese: 在恶魔祭坛获得4件道具且没有死亡。
description.spanish: Recoge 4 objetos de un Altar Demoníaco sin morir.
description.tchinese: 在一次冒險中，從惡魔祭壇獲得4件或以上道具

description.brazilian: Segure 500 moedas.
description.spanish: Consigue llevar 500 monedas.

description.brazilian: Compre 20 itens em uma partida.
description.french: Acheter 20 objets en une seule partie.
description.schinese: 单次冒险中购买20件道具。
description.spanish: Compra 20 objetos en una sola partida.
description.tchinese: 在一次冒險中購買20件以上道具

description.brazilian: Derrote a Alma Perdida sem sofrer danos.
description.english: Defeat Lost Soul without taking damage.
description.french: Vaincre l'Âme Perdue sans recevoir de dégâts.
description.polish: Pokonaj Zagubioną Duszę bez otrzymywania obrażeń.
description.russian: Победите Заблудшую Душу, не получив урона.
description.spanish: Derrota a Alma Perdida sin recibir daño.

displayName.russian: Даже Близко не Моя Финальная Форма

description.brazilian: Fuja de Tartarus sem usar nenhuma habilidade.
description.english: Escape Tartarus without using any abilities.
description.french: S'échapper de Tartarus sans utiliser de compétences.
description.polish: Ucieknij z Tartaru bez użycia żadnych umiejętności.
description.russian: Сбегите из Тартара, не используя никаких способностей.
description.schinese: 不使用任何技能逃离塔耳塔洛斯。
description.spanish: Huye del Tártaro sin usar ninguna habilidad.

description.brazilian: Fuja de Tartarus sem pegar itens. (equipamento inicial e recompensas de arena permitidas)
description.english: Escape Tartarus without picking up items. (starting gear and arena rewards allowed)
description.french: S'échapper de Tartarus sans ramasser d'objets. (équipement de départ autorisé)
description.polish: Ucieknij z Tartaru bez podnoszenia przedmiotów. (dozwolone są przedmioty startowe i nagrody z aren)
description.russian: Сбегите из Тартара, не подбирая предметы. (разрешено стартовое снаряжение и награды на арене)
description.schinese: 不拾取任何道具逃离塔耳塔洛斯（初始装备和竞技场奖励除外）
description.spanish: Escapa del Tártaro sin recoger objetos. (Se permiten recompensas de equipo inicial y de arena)
description.tchinese: 不撿任何道具並逃出Tartarus (只可撿開場及競技場的獎勵)
description.turkish: Eşya toplamadan Tartarus'tan kaçın. (başlangıç donanımı ve arena ödüllerine izin verilir)

description.brazilian: Leve todos os personagens ao nível 5.
description.french: Atteindre le niveau 5 avec tous les personnages.
description.schinese: 所有角色的等级达到5级。
description.spanish: Lleva a todos los personajes al nivel 5.

description.brazilian: Morra pela primeira vez.
description.spanish: Muere por primera vez.

description.brazilian: Fuja do Buraco
description.spanish: Escapa del Agujero.

description.brazilian: Fuja do Coliseu.
description.spanish: Escapa del Coliseo.

description.brazilian: Fuja da Selva Indomada
description.spanish: Escapa de la Jungla Indomable.

description.brazilian: Fuja de Tartarus
description.spanish: Escapa del Tártaro.

description.brazilian: Derrote qualquer chefe como Robbie usando o Braço Alienígena
description.english: Defeat any boss as Robbie with an Alien Arm.
description.french: Vaincre n'importe quel boss avec un Bras Alien en tant que Robbie.
description.polish: Pokonaj dowolnego bossa jako Robbie z Ręką Kosmity.
description.russian: Победите любого босса, играя за Робби, с помощью Руки Чужого.
description.schinese: 使用罗比用异星手臂击败任意BOSS。
description.spanish: Derrota a cualquier jefe llevando a Robbie con un brazo alienígena.
description.tchinese: 以羅比和外星人手臂擊殺任何一個魔王
description.turkish: Herhangi bir boss'u Uzaylı Silahı ile Robbie olarak yenin.

description.brazilian: Derrote O Engenheiro sem danificá-lo com um golpe normal.
description.english: Defeat The Engineer without damaging him with a normal hit.
description.french: Vaincre l'Ingénieur sans lui infliger de dégâts avec un coup normal.
description.polish: Pokonaj Inżyniera bez zadawania mu obrażeń zwykłym trafieniem.
description.russian: Победите Инженера, не нанося ему урон обычным ударом.
description.schinese: 不使用普通攻击的情况下击败工程师。
description.spanish: Derrota al Ingeniero sin dañarlo con un golpe normal.
description.tchinese: 在不用普攻的情況下擊殺工程師
description.turkish: Mühendisi normal bir vuruşla ona zarar vermeden yen.
